post.description: Upload or update item master data for SKUs

case_pack_quantity.description: Number of units in a case

height.description: Height of the item in inches

width.description: Width of the item in inches

length.description: Length of the item in inches

weight.description: Weight of the item in pounds

cases_per_layer.description: Number of cases per layer on a pallet

pallet_height.description: Height of a full pallet in inches

pallet_weight.description: Weight of a full pallet in pounds

lot_tracked.description: Whether the item is tracked by lot number

exp_tracked.description: Whether the item is tracked by expiration date

message.description: Success message indicating number of items created/updated

value.message: No changes were made to the item master.
